name: 100% Orange Juice - Nath & Tomato+Mimyuu Character Pack
detailed_description:
100% Orange Juice - Nath & Tomato+Mimyuu Character Pack adds 2 new playable character combinations from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Nath who powers up with battle cards to devastating effect, and the prankster duo, Tomato&Mimyuu with their unique tag team play.

Character Pack includes:
  • Nath from ‘Sora’
  • Tomato&Mimyuu from ‘QP Shooting’
  • New, unique Hyper Cards for both characters to bring chaos to the battlefield with!
  • New music tracks play as Nath and Tomato&Mimyuu's themes

The new characters are designed by Orange Juice’s original staff for the game’s English Steam release, with character and card artwork by Hono.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Процессор: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Direct3D compatible video card with 256MB memory or more
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectSound compatible sound card
